data.title: Amazing view and grounds!
data.text: I was brought here by a local to tour the grounds.  It was a wonderful spot.  The flowers and plantings are amazing.  There are hidden meditation benches, fish ponds and amazing ocean views. Free admission to a lovely spot!

data.title: Exquisite ocean views and remarkable gardens
data.text: A beautiful, peaceful place off the beaten path in San Diego County, The Self Realization Gardens is a 'must visit' place when you are on the coast. Beautifully manicured with gardens that are the envy of all, terrific and well-maintained Koi ponds with very large and colorful fish, this little known spot is one you will never forget. Sit and enjoy the peace and quiet while you sit and look out over the Pacific Ocean!

data.title: Encinitas Treasure
data.text: When friends come to town,we always take them to the gardens. It is not large,but the grounds are pristine along with  Koi pools. You can look at the beautiful ocean from a different perspective,or sit and meditate or just enjoy the array of plants, flowers etc. It is free,but a donation is appreciated. Please ck. their website for day and times it is open. If you are in Encinitas,don't miss going to these gardens.

data.title: Pleasure trip
data.text: Great and relaxing place. The pond up the hill has the best view with the ocean. Def a relaxing and memorable experience.

data.title: Beautiful place for some peace & quiet
data.text: Situated overlooking the Pacific, strolling these gardens is pure bliss! I could sit all day in the green, gorgeous setting. Easy to park on the street nearby, no fee, & just CALM.

data.title: Take a break from the traffic
data.text: Great place to get away from the hustle-bustle of the traffics and just be at peace.  Beautiful and peaceful.

data.title: Nice free visit.
data.text: Basically a Zen garden with many paths to follow, most leading to the cliff and the ocean view. Many types of different fauna and very unusual. Lots of meditation going on. Beautiful, quiet place to enjoy.

data.title: Peaceful refuge
data.text: A very quiet and peaceful garden.  Probably the most pristine gardens we have ever visited. Koi ponds, running water, meditation coves, and a beautiful ocean view. Whispering is recommended, or no talking at all. You will leave feeling centered and awed.

data.title: Amazing Place
data.text: This is a peaceful and beautiful place to visit. Lush gardens and fish ponds. Stunning ocean views. Many spots for reflection and/or meditation, or just stroll through and enjoy the serenity.

data.title: Nature and meditation
data.text: The temple is very quite and surrounded by lush green gardens. Perfect for a city get a way and for meditation and seclusion.

data.title: Beautiful view
data.text: Had such an amazing time just sitting and thinking. it was very peaceful and provided much clarity...................................................................................................................

data.title: Best views in Encinitas
data.text: This place is a great place to bring your spouse and kick back in the botanical gardens lots of great views they have some benches you can sit on lots of nice plants and flowers and the biggest koi fish you ever saw

data.title: Relaxation and Realization!
data.text: Such a lovely garden area where peace and quiet contemplation are respected and recognized.   You can meander through the pathways or quietly sit in the silence of the ocean crashing below you.  Not to be missed if you are in North County!

data.title: Beautiful little botanical walk
data.text: If you're seeking a meditation spot, it doesn't get better than this one . If you're into a short little nature walk- also excellent

data.title: Paradise
data.text: This place was truly beautiful. The love and peace in the air is undeniable! Come to meditate, or just to relax and watch the ocean, walk among the beautiful flowering plants and koi pond or to sit with a good book. The sound of the ocean and the buzz of hummingbirds and dragonflies and the smell of the beautiful flowers is enough to delight all your senses. This is truly a beautiful gift, offered by the organisation to the public.

data.title: Beautiful and serene
data.text: We enjoy a drive to Encinitas just to visit this place.  The little koi pond and gardens are such a neatly kept hidden secret.  Love spending an hour under the shady trees and quiet benches overlooking the beach.  Always have beautiful healthy plants and gardens. It feels far better than visiting a botanical garden.  There is absolute zen feel to it!  A must visit to the place if you are in and around Encinitas!

data.title: One of the Best...and it's free
data.text:
My mom has been talking about this place since she was taken here by one of my aunts. We tried going there but it was closed. Then we figured out the hours.

The place was nature-al! The kids love the kois and the trees and we all love the ocean view. Breath taking sceneries. I think the quietness welcomes calmness and just strengthens the ambience for nature to wow the visitors.

Again...see it for yourself. 😉

data.title: Okay for a twenty minute stop.
data.text: This is a free garden to visit and it does have some cool plants to see.  They are extremely strict on their no photo policy and you must talk almost in a whisper or be reprimanded by security.  Not a place for small children or loud teens.  It also had a terrible smell, I am not sure why.  Wouldn't go back. Nice to see once.

data.title: Blissful time in Encinitas
data.text: Don't miss the opportunity to spend time in these immaculate gardens by the ocean in Encinitas. They truly are a labour of love and every moment I spent here is treasured. A very special place!

data.title: Lovely Gardens
data.text: Nice relaxing place to spend wandering and watching the koi and insects.  Lots of places to sit and meditate or just quietly enjoy
